networked_experiments

Class HMOpenMLConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • networked_experiments.HMOpenMLConnector

  • public class HMOpenMLConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the basics functions that invoked the OpenML API in order to run networked experiments, obtain the data and the folds from OpenML, as well as upload the results to their service and make them available for other researchers and comparisons.
